intro.headline: You think it, we create it
intro.description: Visual identity, creative strategy, and digital storytelling for brands that matter.

founder.title: Meet the founder
founder.quote: Design isn't just how it looks — it's how it makes people feel. Minusu was born from the desire to simplify noise into meaning.
founder.bio: From sketching logos in notebooks to building emotional brand systems, my journey's been rooted in clarity and curiosity. I created Minusu as a space for design that dares to feel.
founder.name: Javier

cards.title: Complete Online Presence
cards.subtitle: Full digital ecosystem development
cards.description: Transform your digital footprint with a comprehensive online presence. We create cohesive, user-centered digital experiences that span across all platforms, from your website to social media channels. Our approach ensures consistent branding, seamless user journeys, and measurable results that drive engagement and growth.

cards.title: Social Media
cards.subtitle: Content strategy & management
cards.description: Elevate your social media presence with strategic content that resonates. We develop and execute tailored social media strategies that build meaningful connections with your audience. From content creation to community management, we help you tell your story in a way that engages and inspires.

cards.title: Product Design
cards.subtitle: Digital & physical product design
cards.description: Create products that users love with our human-centered design approach. Whether digital or physical, we combine aesthetic excellence with functional innovation to deliver products that solve real problems. Our process ensures every detail is crafted with purpose and precision.

cards.title: Brand Identity
cards.subtitle: Complete brand system with website
cards.description: Build a powerful brand identity that stands out in today's crowded marketplace. We develop comprehensive brand systems that capture your essence and communicate your values. From visual identity to brand guidelines, we create cohesive brand experiences that resonate with your audience and drive recognition.

cards.title: Logo Design
cards.subtitle: Custom brand mark creation
cards.description: Create a distinctive logo that becomes the cornerstone of your brand identity. Our logo design process combines strategic thinking with creative excellence to deliver a mark that's both memorable and meaningful. We craft logos that work across all platforms and scales, ensuring your brand makes a lasting impression.

quotes.name: James Wilson
quotes.quote: The results speak for themselves - our engagement has increased dramatically.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Ready to start your project? Get in touch and let's create something extraordinary together.
